Jane Lynch , the 50-year-old actress- who plays scathing cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester on the US TV show- believes there are many similarities between the teacher and the straight-talking talent show judge. She said: If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her.`` He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her. Doch was ist sie in seinen Augen? Xbox ist eine Entertainment-Zentrale f?r die Familie. Mit ihr kn?pft man soziale Kontakte. Mit ihr schaut man TV. Bei uns steht Hulu in den Startl?chern. Sie ist das einzige System, bei dem man selbst der Controller ist.
